ComicInfo.Summary:
Ideas for tv shows that would go well with right-wing news programs, showing the foibles of left-wing politicians.
Comparisons of gross happenings with extra-gross happenings.
A collection of cartoons.
Movie stills with absurd captions.
Monroe dreams he's Harry Potter and other people he knows are also in the story.
The Black Spy, as a pirate, holds up the White Spy for treasure, but the White Spy has the last laugh.
Fake historical facts.
Captioned images of postage stamps that the USPS did not issue in the Star Wars set.
The chaos that happens on a middle school field trip.
Things that might, but likely won't, happen if significant global warming actually occurs.
Captioned photos of events at Wrestlemania, including Donald Trump's shaving of Vince McMahon's head.
Compares the appearance of modern celebrites to ancient statues.
Goofy comments about the movie, along the red carpet for the premiere where the stars are all in costume.
Various short satires of pop culture.
Transcript of the guys from tv show The Best Damn Sports Show Period, discussing their parody in MAD #475.

ComicInfo.Title: Drawn-Out Dramas; Fox News Comedy Shows That Never Got Off The Ground; Final Installment of The Gross And Beyond Gross Trilogy; The Strip Club; MAD's Arrr!-Rated Outtakes From Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End; Monroe and... Harry Potter; Spy Vs. Spy; More Facts That Sound For A Second Like They Might Be True...But Aren't; Rejected Star Wars Stamps; MAD's Minute-By-Minute Breakdown Of A School Field Trip; A MAD Look At Global Warming; MAD's Touchy-Feely Wrestlemania Outtakes; Startling Similarities Between Modern Celebrities & Ancient Artifacts!; Things Overheard At The Premiere of Pirates Of The Caribbean 3; The Fundalini Pages; Transcript of The Best Damn MAD Plug Period
ComicInfo.Writer: Al Jaffee,Anthony Barbieri,Chari Pere,Douglas Paszkiewicz,Frank Santopadre,Jacob Lambert,Jeff Kruse,John Caldwell,John Kovaleski,Justin Heimberg,Keith Knight,Peter Kuper,Sergio Aragonés,Teresa Burns Parkhurst,Tim Carvell,Frank Santopadre,John Caldwell,Keith Knight,John Kovaleski,Dustin Glick,Dan Long,Feggo,Douglas Paszkiewicz,Anthony Barbieri,Peter Kuper,Jeff Kruse,Teresa Burns Parkhurst,Sergio Aragonés,Jacob Lambert
